tool_description: Calculates SLA compliance status, time remaining until breach, and escalation triggers based on ticket age and service level agreements.

issue_severity.description: Issue severity level (low, medium, high, critical)

error_messages: Invalid customer tier: Customer tier must be one of [basic, premium, enterprise]. Check customer configuration.
Invalid severity level: Issue severity must be one of [low, medium, high, critical]. Verify ticket classification.
Invalid timestamp format: Timestamps must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Future creation time: created_at cannot be in the future relative to current_time.
usage: Provide ticket details including customer_tier and issue_severity to calculate SLA status. The tool determines if escalation is needed based on time thresholds.

escalation_threshold_reached.description: Whether escalation threshold has been reached
